ayah: ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِي لَهُۥ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَهُ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ ٱلۡخَبِيرُ
ayah_translit: al-hamdu lillahi alladhi lahu ma fi al-samawati wama fi al-ardi walahu al-hamdu fi al-akhirati wahuwa al-hakimu al-khabiru
ayah_english: All praises (be) to Allah the One to Whom belongs the One to Whom belongs whatever (is) in the heavens and whatever (is) in the earth and for Him (are) all praises in the Hereafter And He (is) the All-Wise the All-Aware

ayah_english: All praises (be) to Allah the One to Whom belongs the One to Whom belongs whatever (is) in the heavens and whatever (is) in the earth and for Him (are) all praises in the Hereafter And He (is) the All-Wise the All-Aware

ayah: يَعۡلَمُ مَا يَلِجُ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا يَخۡرُجُ مِنۡهَا وَمَا يَنزِلُ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَمَا يَعۡرُجُ فِيهَاۚ وَهُوَ ٱلرَّحِيمُ ٱلۡغَفُورُ
ayah_translit: ya'lamu ma yaliju fi al-ardi wama yakhruju min'ha wama yanzilu mina al-samai wama ya'ruju fiha wahuwa al-rahimu al-ghafuru
ayah_english: He knows what penetrates in the earth and what comes out from it and what descends from the heaven and what ascends therein And He (is) the Most Merciful the Oft-Forgiving

ayah: يَعۡلَمُ مَا يَلِجُ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا يَخۡرُجُ مِنۡهَا وَمَا يَنزِلُ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَمَا يَعۡرُجُ فِيهَاۚ وَهُوَ ٱلرَّحِيمُ ٱلۡغَفُورُ

ayah_translit: ya'lamu ma yaliju fi al-ardi wama yakhruju min'ha wama yanzilu mina al-samai wama ya'ruju fiha wahuwa al-rahimu al-ghafuru

ayah: يَعۡلَمُ مَا يَلِجُ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا يَخۡرُجُ مِنۡهَا وَمَا يَنزِلُ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَمَا يَعۡرُجُ فِيهَاۚ وَهُوَ ٱلرَّحِيمُ ٱلۡغَفُورُ
ayah_translit: ya'lamu ma yaliju fi al-ardi wama yakhruju min'ha wama yanzilu mina al-samai wama ya'ruju fiha wahuwa al-rahimu al-ghafuru
ayah_english: He knows what penetrates in the earth and what comes out from it and what descends from the heaven and what ascends therein And He (is) the Most Merciful the Oft-Forgiving

ayah: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَا تَأۡتِينَا ٱلسَّاعَةُۖ قُلۡ بَلَىٰ وَرَبِّي لَتَأۡتِيَنَّكُمۡ عَٰلِمِ ٱلۡغَيۡبِۖ لَا يَعۡزُبُ عَنۡهُ مِثۡقَالُ ذَرَّةٖ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَلَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَآ أَصۡغَرُ مِن ذَٰلِكَ وَلَآ أَكۡبَرُ إِلَّا فِي كِتَٰبٖ مُّبِينٖ
ayah_translit: waqala alladhina kafaru la tatina al-sa'atu qul bala warabbi latatiyannakum alimi al-ghaybi la ya'zubu anhu mith'qalu dharratin fi al-samawati wala fi al-ardi wala asgharu min dhalika wala akbaru illa fi kitabin mubinin
ayah_english: But say those who disbelieve Not will come to us the Hour Say Nay by my Lord surely it will come to you (He is the) Knower (of) the unseen Not escapes from Him (the) weight (of) an atom in the heavens and not in the earth and not smaller than that and not greater but (is) in a Record Clear

ayah: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَا تَأۡتِينَا ٱلسَّاعَةُۖ قُلۡ بَلَىٰ وَرَبِّي لَتَأۡتِيَنَّكُمۡ عَٰلِمِ ٱلۡغَيۡبِۖ لَا يَعۡزُبُ عَنۡهُ مِثۡقَالُ ذَرَّةٖ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَلَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَآ أَصۡغَرُ مِن ذَٰلِكَ وَلَآ أَكۡبَرُ إِلَّا فِي كِتَٰبٖ مُّبِينٖ

ayah: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَا تَأۡتِينَا ٱلسَّاعَةُۖ قُلۡ بَلَىٰ وَرَبِّي لَتَأۡتِيَنَّكُمۡ عَٰلِمِ ٱلۡغَيۡبِۖ لَا يَعۡزُبُ عَنۡهُ مِثۡقَالُ ذَرَّةٖ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَلَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَآ أَصۡغَرُ مِن ذَٰلِكَ وَلَآ أَكۡبَرُ إِلَّا فِي كِتَٰبٖ مُّبِينٖ

ayah: لِّيَجۡزِيَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِۚ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ لَهُم مَّغۡفِرَةٞ وَرِزۡقٞ كَرِيمٞ
ayah_translit: liyajziya alladhina amanu wa'amilu al-salihati ulaika lahum maghfiratun wariz'qun karimun
ayah_english: That He may reward those who believe and do righteous deeds Those for them (will be) forgiveness and a provision noble

ayah: وَٱلَّذِينَ سَعَوۡ فِيٓ ءَايَٰتِنَا مُعَٰجِزِينَ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٞ مِّن رِّجۡزٍ أَلِيمٞ
ayah_translit: wa-alladhina sa'aw fi ayatina mu'ajizina ulaika lahum adhabun min rij'zin alimun
ayah_english: But those who strive against Our Verses (to) cause failure those for them (is) a punishment of foul nature painful

ayah: وَيَرَى ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡعِلۡمَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أُنزِلَ إِلَيۡكَ مِن رَّبِّكَ هُوَ ٱلۡحَقَّ وَيَهۡدِيٓ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطِ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡحَمِيدِ
ayah_translit: wayara alladhina utu al-'il'ma alladhi unzila ilayka min rabbika huwa al-haqa wayahdi ila sirati al-'azizi al-hamidi
ayah_english: And see those who have been given the knowledge (that) what is revealed to you from your Lord [it] (is) the Truth and it guides to (the) Path (of) the All-Mighty the Praiseworthy

ayah: وَيَرَى ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡعِلۡمَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أُنزِلَ إِلَيۡكَ مِن رَّبِّكَ هُوَ ٱلۡحَقَّ وَيَهۡدِيٓ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطِ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡحَمِيدِ

ayah: وَيَرَى ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡعِلۡمَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أُنزِلَ إِلَيۡكَ مِن رَّبِّكَ هُوَ ٱلۡحَقَّ وَيَهۡدِيٓ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطِ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡحَمِيدِ

ayah: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ هَلۡ نَدُلُّكُمۡ عَلَىٰ رَجُلٖ يُنَبِّئُكُمۡ إِذَا مُزِّقۡتُمۡ كُلَّ مُمَزَّقٍ إِنَّكُمۡ لَفِي خَلۡقٖ جَدِيدٍ
ayah_translit: waqala alladhina kafaru hal nadullukum ala rajulin yunabbi-ukum idha muzziq'tum kulla mumazzaqin innakum lafi khalqin jadidin
ayah_english: But say those who disbelieve Shall we direct you to a man who informs you when you have disintegrated (in) total disintegration indeed you surely (will be) in a creation new

ayah: أَفۡتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا أَم بِهِۦ جِنَّةُۢۗ بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ فِي ٱلۡعَذَابِ وَٱلضَّلَٰلِ ٱلۡبَعِيدِ
ayah_translit: aftara ala al-lahi kadhiban am bihi jinnatun bali alladhina la yu'minuna bil-akhirati fi al-'adhabi wal-dalali al-ba'idi
ayah_english: Has he invented about Allah a lie or in him (is) madness Nay those who (do) not believe in the Hereafter (will be) in the punishment and error far

ayah: أَفۡتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا أَم بِهِۦ جِنَّةُۢۗ بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ فِي ٱلۡعَذَابِ وَٱلضَّلَٰلِ ٱلۡبَعِيدِ

ayah_english: Has he invented about Allah a lie or in him (is) madness Nay those who (do) not believe in the Hereafter (will be) in the punishment and error far

ayah: أَفَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ إِلَىٰ مَا بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَمَا خَلۡفَهُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ إِن نَّشَأۡ نَخۡسِفۡ بِهِمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ أَوۡ نُسۡقِطۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡ كِسَفٗا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَةٗ لِّكُلِّ عَبۡدٖ مُّنِيبٖ
ayah_translit: afalam yaraw ila ma bayna aydihim wama khalfahum mina al-samai wal-ardi in nasha nakhsif bihimu al-arda aw nus'qit alayhim kisafan mina al-samai inna fi dhalika laayatan likulli abdin munibin
ayah_english: Then, do not they see towards what (is) before them (is) before them and what (is) behind them of the heaven and the earth If We will We (could) cause to swallow them We (could) cause to swallow them the earth or cause to fall upon them fragments from the sky Indeed in that surely, is a Sign for every slave who turns (to Allah)

ayah_english: Then, do not they see towards what (is) before them (is) before them and what (is) behind them of the heaven and the earth If We will We (could) cause to swallow them We (could) cause to swallow them the earth or cause to fall upon them fragments from the sky Indeed in that surely, is a Sign for every slave who turns (to Allah)

ayah_english: Then, do not they see towards what (is) before them (is) before them and what (is) behind them of the heaven and the earth If We will We (could) cause to swallow them We (could) cause to swallow them the earth or cause to fall upon them fragments from the sky Indeed in that surely, is a Sign for every slave who turns (to Allah)

ayah: أَفَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ إِلَىٰ مَا بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَمَا خَلۡفَهُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ إِن نَّشَأۡ نَخۡسِفۡ بِهِمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ أَوۡ نُسۡقِطۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡ كِسَفٗا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَةٗ لِّكُلِّ عَبۡدٖ مُّنِيبٖ

ayah: ۞وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا دَاوُۥدَ مِنَّا فَضۡلٗاۖ يَٰجِبَالُ أَوِّبِي مَعَهُۥ وَٱلطَّيۡرَۖ وَأَلَنَّا لَهُ ٱلۡحَدِيدَ
ayah_translit: walaqad atayna dawuda minna fadlan yajibalu awwibi ma'ahu wal-tayra wa-alanna lahu al-hadida
ayah_english: And certainly We gave Dawood from Us Bounty O mountains! Repeat praises with him and the birds And We made pliable for him [the] iron

ayah: ۞وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا دَاوُۥدَ مِنَّا فَضۡلٗاۖ يَٰجِبَالُ أَوِّبِي مَعَهُۥ وَٱلطَّيۡرَۖ وَأَلَنَّا لَهُ ٱلۡحَدِيدَ

ayah: أَنِ ٱعۡمَلۡ سَٰبِغَٰتٖ وَقَدِّرۡ فِي ٱلسَّرۡدِۖ وَٱعۡمَلُواْ صَٰلِحًاۖ إِنِّي بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ بَصِيرٞ
ayah_translit: ani i'mal sabighatin waqaddir fi al-sardi wa-i'malu salihan inni bima ta'maluna basirun
ayah_english: That make full coats of mail and measure precisely [of] the links (of armor) and work righteousness Indeed I Am of what you do All-Seer

ayah: وَلِسُلَيۡمَٰنَ ٱلرِّيحَ غُدُوُّهَا شَهۡرٞ وَرَوَاحُهَا شَهۡرٞۖ وَأَسَلۡنَا لَهُۥ عَيۡنَ ٱلۡقِطۡرِۖ وَمِنَ ٱلۡجِنِّ مَن يَعۡمَلُ بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡهِ بِإِذۡنِ رَبِّهِۦۖ وَمَن يَزِغۡ مِنۡهُمۡ عَنۡ أَمۡرِنَا نُذِقۡهُ مِنۡ عَذَابِ ٱلسَّعِيرِ
ayah_translit: walisulaymana al-riha ghuduwwuha shahrun warawahuha shahrun wa-asalna lahu ayna al-qit'ri wamina al-jini man ya'malu bayna yadayhi bi-idh'ni rabbihi waman yazigh min'hum an amrina nudhiq'hu min adhabi al-sa'iri
ayah_english: And to Sulaiman the wind its morning course (was) a month and its afternoon course (was) a month and We caused to flow for him a spring (of) molten copper And [of] the jinn who worked before him before him by the permission (of) his Lord And whoever deviated among them from Our Command We will make him taste of (the) punishment (of) the Blaze

ayah: وَلِسُلَيۡمَٰنَ ٱلرِّيحَ غُدُوُّهَا شَهۡرٞ وَرَوَاحُهَا شَهۡرٞۖ وَأَسَلۡنَا لَهُۥ عَيۡنَ ٱلۡقِطۡرِۖ وَمِنَ ٱلۡجِنِّ مَن يَعۡمَلُ بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡهِ بِإِذۡنِ رَبِّهِۦۖ وَمَن يَزِغۡ مِنۡهُمۡ عَنۡ أَمۡرِنَا نُذِقۡهُ مِنۡ عَذَابِ ٱلسَّعِيرِ

ayah: وَلِسُلَيۡمَٰنَ ٱلرِّيحَ غُدُوُّهَا شَهۡرٞ وَرَوَاحُهَا شَهۡرٞۖ وَأَسَلۡنَا لَهُۥ عَيۡنَ ٱلۡقِطۡرِۖ وَمِنَ ٱلۡجِنِّ مَن يَعۡمَلُ بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡهِ بِإِذۡنِ رَبِّهِۦۖ وَمَن يَزِغۡ مِنۡهُمۡ عَنۡ أَمۡرِنَا نُذِقۡهُ مِنۡ عَذَابِ ٱلسَّعِيرِ

ayah_english: And to Sulaiman the wind its morning course (was) a month and its afternoon course (was) a month and We caused to flow for him a spring (of) molten copper And [of] the jinn who worked before him before him by the permission (of) his Lord And whoever deviated among them from Our Command We will make him taste of (the) punishment (of) the Blaze

ayah: يَعۡمَلُونَ لَهُۥ مَا يَشَآءُ مِن مَّحَٰرِيبَ وَتَمَٰثِيلَ وَجِفَانٖ كَٱلۡجَوَابِ وَقُدُورٖ رَّاسِيَٰتٍۚ ٱعۡمَلُوٓاْ ءَالَ دَاوُۥدَ شُكۡرٗاۚ وَقَلِيلٞ مِّنۡ عِبَادِيَ ٱلشَّكُورُ
ayah_translit: ya'maluna lahu ma yashau min mahariba watamathila wajifanin kal-jawabi waqudurin rasiyatin i'malu ala dawuda shuk'ran waqalilun min ibadiya al-shakuru
ayah_english: They worked for him what he willed of elevated chambers and statues and bowls like reservoirs and cooking-pots fixed Work O family (of) Dawood! (in) gratitude But few of My slaves (are) grateful

ayah: يَعۡمَلُونَ لَهُۥ مَا يَشَآءُ مِن مَّحَٰرِيبَ وَتَمَٰثِيلَ وَجِفَانٖ كَٱلۡجَوَابِ وَقُدُورٖ رَّاسِيَٰتٍۚ ٱعۡمَلُوٓاْ ءَالَ دَاوُۥدَ شُكۡرٗاۚ وَقَلِيلٞ مِّنۡ عِبَادِيَ ٱلشَّكُورُ

ayah: يَعۡمَلُونَ لَهُۥ مَا يَشَآءُ مِن مَّحَٰرِيبَ وَتَمَٰثِيلَ وَجِفَانٖ كَٱلۡجَوَابِ وَقُدُورٖ رَّاسِيَٰتٍۚ ٱعۡمَلُوٓاْ ءَالَ دَاوُۥدَ شُكۡرٗاۚ وَقَلِيلٞ مِّنۡ عِبَادِيَ ٱلشَّكُورُ
ayah_translit: ya'maluna lahu ma yashau min mahariba watamathila wajifanin kal-jawabi waqudurin rasiyatin i'malu ala dawuda shuk'ran waqalilun min ibadiya al-shakuru

ayah_translit: ya'maluna lahu ma yashau min mahariba watamathila wajifanin kal-jawabi waqudurin rasiyatin i'malu ala dawuda shuk'ran waqalilun min ibadiya al-shakuru
ayah_english: They worked for him what he willed of elevated chambers and statues and bowls like reservoirs and cooking-pots fixed Work O family (of) Dawood! (in) gratitude But few of My slaves (are) grateful

ayah: فَلَمَّا قَضَيۡنَا عَلَيۡهِ ٱلۡمَوۡتَ مَا دَلَّهُمۡ عَلَىٰ مَوۡتِهِۦٓ إِلَّا دَآبَّةُ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ تَأۡكُلُ مِنسَأَتَهُۥۖ فَلَمَّا خَرَّ تَبَيَّنَتِ ٱلۡجِنُّ أَن لَّوۡ كَانُواْ يَعۡلَمُونَ ٱلۡغَيۡبَ مَا لَبِثُواْ فِي ٱلۡعَذَابِ ٱلۡمُهِينِ
ayah_translit: falamma qadayna alayhi al-mawta ma dallahum ala mawtihi illa dabbatu al-ardi takulu minsa-atahu falamma kharra tabayyanati al-jinu an law kanu ya'lamuna al-ghayba ma labithu fi al-'adhabi al-muhini
ayah_english: Then when We decreed for him the death not indicated to them [on] his death except a creature (of) the earth eating his staff But when he fell down became clear (to) the jinn that if they had known the unseen not they (would have) remained in the punishment humiliating

ayah_english: Then when We decreed for him the death not indicated to them [on] his death except a creature (of) the earth eating his staff But when he fell down became clear (to) the jinn that if they had known the unseen not they (would have) remained in the punishment humiliating

ayah: لَقَدۡ كَانَ لِسَبَإٖ فِي مَسۡكَنِهِمۡ ءَايَةٞۖ جَنَّتَانِ عَن يَمِينٖ وَشِمَالٖۖ كُلُواْ مِن رِّزۡقِ رَبِّكُمۡ وَٱشۡكُرُواْ لَهُۥۚ بَلۡدَةٞ طَيِّبَةٞ وَرَبٌّ غَفُورٞ
ayah_translit: laqad kana lisaba-in fi maskanihim ayatun jannatani an yaminin washimalin kulu min riz'qi rabbikum wa-ush'kuru lahu baldatun tayyibatun warabbun ghafurun
ayah_english: Certainly (there) was for Saba in their dwelling place a sign: Two gardens on (the) right and (on the) left Eat from (the) provision (of) your Lord and be grateful to Him A land good and a Lord Oft-Forgiving

ayah: لَقَدۡ كَانَ لِسَبَإٖ فِي مَسۡكَنِهِمۡ ءَايَةٞۖ جَنَّتَانِ عَن يَمِينٖ وَشِمَالٖۖ كُلُواْ مِن رِّزۡقِ رَبِّكُمۡ وَٱشۡكُرُواْ لَهُۥۚ بَلۡدَةٞ طَيِّبَةٞ وَرَبٌّ غَفُورٞ

ayah: لَقَدۡ كَانَ لِسَبَإٖ فِي مَسۡكَنِهِمۡ ءَايَةٞۖ جَنَّتَانِ عَن يَمِينٖ وَشِمَالٖۖ كُلُواْ مِن رِّزۡقِ رَبِّكُمۡ وَٱشۡكُرُواْ لَهُۥۚ بَلۡدَةٞ طَيِّبَةٞ وَرَبٌّ غَفُورٞ

ayah: فَأَعۡرَضُواْ فَأَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ سَيۡلَ ٱلۡعَرِمِ وَبَدَّلۡنَٰهُم بِجَنَّتَيۡهِمۡ جَنَّتَيۡنِ ذَوَاتَيۡ أُكُلٍ خَمۡطٖ وَأَثۡلٖ وَشَيۡءٖ مِّن سِدۡرٖ قَلِيلٖ
ayah_translit: fa-a'radu fa-arsalna alayhim sayla al-'arimi wabaddalnahum bijannatayhim jannatayni dhawatay ukulin khamtin wa-athlin washayin min sid'rin qalilin
ayah_english: But they turned away so We sent upon them (the) flood (of) the dam and We changed for them their two gardens (with) two gardens producing fruit producing fruit bitter and tamarisks and (some)thing of lote trees few

ayah: فَأَعۡرَضُواْ فَأَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ سَيۡلَ ٱلۡعَرِمِ وَبَدَّلۡنَٰهُم بِجَنَّتَيۡهِمۡ جَنَّتَيۡنِ ذَوَاتَيۡ أُكُلٍ خَمۡطٖ وَأَثۡلٖ وَشَيۡءٖ مِّن سِدۡرٖ قَلِيلٖ

ayah: ذَٰلِكَ جَزَيۡنَٰهُم بِمَا كَفَرُواْۖ وَهَلۡ نُجَٰزِيٓ إِلَّا ٱلۡكَفُورَ
ayah_translit: dhalika jazaynahum bima kafaru wahal nujazi illa al-kafura
ayah_english: That We recompensed them because they disbelieved And not We recompense except the ungrateful

ayah: وَجَعَلۡنَا بَيۡنَهُمۡ وَبَيۡنَ ٱلۡقُرَى ٱلَّتِي بَٰرَكۡنَا فِيهَا قُرٗى ظَٰهِرَةٗ وَقَدَّرۡنَا فِيهَا ٱلسَّيۡرَۖ سِيرُواْ فِيهَا لَيَالِيَ وَأَيَّامًا ءَامِنِينَ
ayah_translit: waja'alna baynahum wabayna al-qura allati barakna fiha quran zahiratan waqaddarna fiha al-sayra siru fiha layaliya wa-ayyaman aminina
ayah_english: And We made between them and between the towns which We had blessed in it towns visible And We determined between them the journey Travel between them (by) night and (by) day safely

ayah: فَقَالُواْ رَبَّنَا بَٰعِدۡ بَيۡنَ أَسۡفَارِنَا وَظَلَمُوٓاْ أَنفُسَهُمۡ فَجَعَلۡنَٰهُمۡ أَحَادِيثَ وَمَزَّقۡنَٰهُمۡ كُلَّ مُمَزَّقٍۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّكُلِّ صَبَّارٖ شَكُورٖ
ayah_translit: faqalu rabbana ba'id bayna asfarina wazalamu anfusahum faja'alnahum ahaditha wamazzaqnahum kulla mumazzaqin inna fi dhalika laayatin likulli sabbarin shakurin
ayah_english: But they said Our Lord lengthen (the distance) between our journeys And they wronged themselves so We made them narrations and We dispersed them (in) a total dispersion Indeed in that surely (are) Signs for everyone patient (and) grateful

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ صَدَّقَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ إِبۡلِيسُ ظَنَّهُۥ فَٱتَّبَعُوهُ إِلَّا فَرِيقٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
ayah_translit: walaqad saddaqa alayhim ib'lisu zannahu fa-ittaba'uhu illa fariqan mina al-mu'minina
ayah_english: And certainly found true about them Iblis his assumption so they followed him except a group of the believers

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ صَدَّقَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ إِبۡلِيسُ ظَنَّهُۥ فَٱتَّبَعُوهُ إِلَّا فَرِيقٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
ayah_translit: walaqad saddaqa alayhim ib'lisu zannahu fa-ittaba'uhu illa fariqan mina al-mu'minina
ayah_english: And certainly found true about them Iblis his assumption so they followed him except a group of the believers

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ صَدَّقَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ إِبۡلِيسُ ظَنَّهُۥ فَٱتَّبَعُوهُ إِلَّا فَرِيقٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

ayah_translit: walaqad saddaqa alayhim ib'lisu zannahu fa-ittaba'uhu illa fariqan mina al-mu'minina
ayah_english: And certainly found true about them Iblis his assumption so they followed him except a group of the believers

ayah: وَمَا كَانَ لَهُۥ عَلَيۡهِم مِّن سُلۡطَٰنٍ إِلَّا لِنَعۡلَمَ مَن يُؤۡمِنُ بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ مِمَّنۡ هُوَ مِنۡهَا فِي شَكّٖۗ وَرَبُّكَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٍ حَفِيظٞ
ayah_translit: wama kana lahu alayhim min sul'tanin illa lina'lama man yu'minu bil-akhirati mimman huwa min'ha fi shakkin warabbuka ala kulli shayin hafizun
ayah_english: And not was for him over them any authority except that We (might) make evident who believes in the Hereafter from (one) who [he] about it (is) in doubt And your Lord over all things (is) a Guardian

ayah: وَمَا كَانَ لَهُۥ عَلَيۡهِم مِّن سُلۡطَٰنٍ إِلَّا لِنَعۡلَمَ مَن يُؤۡمِنُ بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ مِمَّنۡ هُوَ مِنۡهَا فِي شَكّٖۗ وَرَبُّكَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٍ حَفِيظٞ

ayah: قُلِ ٱدۡعُواْ ٱلَّذِينَ زَعَمۡتُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ لَا يَمۡلِكُونَ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٖ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَلَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا لَهُمۡ فِيهِمَا مِن شِرۡكٖ وَمَا لَهُۥ مِنۡهُم مِّن ظَهِيرٖ
ayah_translit: quli id'u alladhina za'amtum min duni al-lahi la yamlikuna mith'qala dharratin fi al-samawati wala fi al-ardi wama lahum fihima min shir'kin wama lahu min'hum min zahirin
ayah_english: Say Call upon those whom you claim besides besides Allah Not they possess (the) weight (of) an atom in the heavens and not in the earth and not for them in both of them any partnership and not for Him from them any supporter

ayah: قُلِ ٱدۡعُواْ ٱلَّذِينَ زَعَمۡتُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ لَا يَمۡلِكُونَ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٖ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَلَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا لَهُمۡ فِيهِمَا مِن شِرۡكٖ وَمَا لَهُۥ مِنۡهُم مِّن ظَهِيرٖ

ayah_translit: quli id'u alladhina za'amtum min duni al-lahi la yamlikuna mith'qala dharratin fi al-samawati wala fi al-ardi wama lahum fihima min shir'kin wama lahu min'hum min zahirin

ayah_translit: quli id'u alladhina za'amtum min duni al-lahi la yamlikuna mith'qala dharratin fi al-samawati wala fi al-ardi wama lahum fihima min shir'kin wama lahu min'hum min zahirin
ayah_english: Say Call upon those whom you claim besides besides Allah Not they possess (the) weight (of) an atom in the heavens and not in the earth and not for them in both of them any partnership and not for Him from them any supporter

ayah: قُلِ ٱدۡعُواْ ٱلَّذِينَ زَعَمۡتُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ لَا يَمۡلِكُونَ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٖ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَلَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا لَهُمۡ فِيهِمَا مِن شِرۡكٖ وَمَا لَهُۥ مِنۡهُم مِّن ظَهِيرٖ
ayah_translit: quli id'u alladhina za'amtum min duni al-lahi la yamlikuna mith'qala dharratin fi al-samawati wala fi al-ardi wama lahum fihima min shir'kin wama lahu min'hum min zahirin
ayah_english: Say Call upon those whom you claim besides besides Allah Not they possess (the) weight (of) an atom in the heavens and not in the earth and not for them in both of them any partnership and not for Him from them any supporter

ayah: وَلَا تَنفَعُ ٱلشَّفَٰعَةُ عِندَهُۥٓ إِلَّا لِمَنۡ أَذِنَ لَهُۥۚ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا فُزِّعَ عَن قُلُوبِهِمۡ قَالُواْ مَاذَا قَالَ رَبُّكُمۡۖ قَالُواْ ٱلۡحَقَّۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَلِيُّ ٱلۡكَبِيرُ
ayah_translit: wala tanfa'u al-shafa'atu indahu illa liman adhina lahu hatta idha fuzzi'a an qulubihim qalu madha qala rabbukum qalu al-haqa wahuwa al-'aliyu al-kabiru
ayah_english: And not benefits the intercession with Him except for (one) whom He permits for him Until when fear is removed on their hearts they will say What is that your Lord has said your Lord has said They will say The truth And He (is) the Most High the Most Great

ayah: وَلَا تَنفَعُ ٱلشَّفَٰعَةُ عِندَهُۥٓ إِلَّا لِمَنۡ أَذِنَ لَهُۥۚ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا فُزِّعَ عَن قُلُوبِهِمۡ قَالُواْ مَاذَا قَالَ رَبُّكُمۡۖ قَالُواْ ٱلۡحَقَّۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَلِيُّ ٱلۡكَبِيرُ

ayah_translit: wala tanfa'u al-shafa'atu indahu illa liman adhina lahu hatta idha fuzzi'a an qulubihim qalu madha qala rabbukum qalu al-haqa wahuwa al-'aliyu al-kabiru
ayah_english: And not benefits the intercession with Him except for (one) whom He permits for him Until when fear is removed on their hearts they will say What is that your Lord has said your Lord has said They will say The truth And He (is) the Most High the Most Great

ayah: وَلَا تَنفَعُ ٱلشَّفَٰعَةُ عِندَهُۥٓ إِلَّا لِمَنۡ أَذِنَ لَهُۥۚ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا فُزِّعَ عَن قُلُوبِهِمۡ قَالُواْ مَاذَا قَالَ رَبُّكُمۡۖ قَالُواْ ٱلۡحَقَّۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَلِيُّ ٱلۡكَبِيرُ
ayah_translit: wala tanfa'u al-shafa'atu indahu illa liman adhina lahu hatta idha fuzzi'a an qulubihim qalu madha qala rabbukum qalu al-haqa wahuwa al-'aliyu al-kabiru
ayah_english: And not benefits the intercession with Him except for (one) whom He permits for him Until when fear is removed on their hearts they will say What is that your Lord has said your Lord has said They will say The truth And He (is) the Most High the Most Great

ayah: ۞قُلۡ مَن يَرۡزُقُكُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ قُلِ ٱللَّهُۖ وَإِنَّآ أَوۡ إِيَّاكُمۡ لَعَلَىٰ هُدًى أَوۡ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ
ayah_translit: qul man yarzuqukum mina al-samawati wal-ardi quli al-lahu wa-inna aw iyyakum la'ala hudan aw fi dalalin mubinin
ayah_english: Say Who provides (for) you from the heavens and the earth Say Allah And indeed we or you (are) surely upon guidance or in error clear

ayah: قُل لَّا تُسۡـَٔلُونَ عَمَّآ أَجۡرَمۡنَا وَلَا نُسۡـَٔلُ عَمَّا تَعۡمَلُونَ
ayah_translit: qul la tus'aluna amma ajramna wala nus'alu amma ta'maluna
ayah_english: Say Not you will be asked about what (the) sins we committed and not we will be asked about what you do

ayah: قُلۡ يَجۡمَعُ بَيۡنَنَا رَبُّنَا ثُمَّ يَفۡتَحُ بَيۡنَنَا بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَهُوَ ٱلۡفَتَّاحُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ
ayah_translit: qul yajma'u baynana rabbuna thumma yaftahu baynana bil-haqi wahuwa al-fatahu al-'alimu
ayah_english: Say Will gather us together our Lord then He will judge between us in truth And He (is) the Judge the All-Knowing

ayah_translit: qul yajma'u baynana rabbuna thumma yaftahu baynana bil-haqi wahuwa al-fatahu al-'alimu
ayah_english: Say Will gather us together our Lord then He will judge between us in truth And He (is) the Judge the All-Knowing

ayah: قُلۡ أَرُونِيَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَلۡحَقۡتُم بِهِۦ شُرَكَآءَۖ كَلَّاۚ بَلۡ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ
ayah_translit: qul aruniya alladhina alhaqtum bihi shurakaa kalla bal huwa al-lahu al-'azizu al-hakimu
ayah_english: Say Show me those whom you have joined with Him (as) partners By no means! Nay He (is) Allah the All-Mighty the All-Wise

ayah: وَمَآ أَرۡسَلۡنَٰكَ إِلَّا كَآفَّةٗ لِّلنَّاسِ بَشِيرٗا وَنَذِيرٗا وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: wama arsalnaka illa kaffatan lilnnasi bashiran wanadhiran walakinna akthara al-nasi la ya'lamuna
ayah_english: And not We have sent you except inclusively to mankind (as) a giver of glad tidings and (as) a warner But most [the] people (do) not know

ayah: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا ٱلۡوَعۡدُ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ
ayah_translit: wayaquluna mata hadha al-wa'du in kuntum sadiqina
ayah_english: And they say When (is) this promise if you are truthful

ayah: قُل لَّكُم مِّيعَادُ يَوۡمٖ لَّا تَسۡتَـٔۡخِرُونَ عَنۡهُ سَاعَةٗ وَلَا تَسۡتَقۡدِمُونَ
ayah_translit: qul lakum mi'adu yawmin la tastakhiruna anhu sa'atan wala tastaqdimuna
ayah_english: Say For you (is the) appointment (of) a Day not you can postpone [of] it (for) an hour and not (can) you precede (it)

ayah_translit: qul lakum mi'adu yawmin la tastakhiruna anhu sa'atan wala tastaqdimuna
ayah_english: Say For you (is the) appointment (of) a Day not you can postpone [of] it (for) an hour and not (can) you precede (it)

ayah: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَن نُّؤۡمِنَ بِهَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ وَلَا بِٱلَّذِي بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡهِۗ وَلَوۡ تَرَىٰٓ إِذِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ مَوۡقُوفُونَ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡ يَرۡجِعُ بَعۡضُهُمۡ إِلَىٰ بَعۡضٍ ٱلۡقَوۡلَ يَقُولُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱسۡتُضۡعِفُواْ لِلَّذِينَ ٱسۡتَكۡبَرُواْ لَوۡلَآ أَنتُمۡ لَكُنَّا مُؤۡمِنِينَ
ayah_translit: waqala alladhina kafaru lan nu'mina bihadha al-qur'ani wala bi-alladhi bayna yadayhi walaw tara idhi al-zalimuna mawqufuna inda rabbihim yarji'u ba'duhum ila ba'din al-qawla yaqulu alladhina us'tud'ifu lilladhina is'takbaru lawla antum lakunna mu'minina
ayah_english: And say those who disbelieve Never will we believe in this Quran and not in (that) which (was) before it (was) before it But if you (could) see when the wrongdoers will be made to stand before their Lord will throw back some of them to others the word Will say those who were oppressed to those who were arrogant If not (for) you certainly we (would) have been believers

ayah: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَن نُّؤۡمِنَ بِهَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ وَلَا بِٱلَّذِي بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡهِۗ وَلَوۡ تَرَىٰٓ إِذِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ مَوۡقُوفُونَ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡ يَرۡجِعُ بَعۡضُهُمۡ إِلَىٰ بَعۡضٍ ٱلۡقَوۡلَ يَقُولُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱسۡتُضۡعِفُواْ لِلَّذِينَ ٱسۡتَكۡبَرُواْ لَوۡلَآ أَنتُمۡ لَكُنَّا مُؤۡمِنِينَ

ayah: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَن نُّؤۡمِنَ بِهَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ وَلَا بِٱلَّذِي بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡهِۗ وَلَوۡ تَرَىٰٓ إِذِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ مَوۡقُوفُونَ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡ يَرۡجِعُ بَعۡضُهُمۡ إِلَىٰ بَعۡضٍ ٱلۡقَوۡلَ يَقُولُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱسۡتُضۡعِفُواْ لِلَّذِينَ ٱسۡتَكۡبَرُواْ لَوۡلَآ أَنتُمۡ لَكُنَّا مُؤۡمِنِينَ

ayah: قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱسۡتَكۡبَرُواْ لِلَّذِينَ ٱسۡتُضۡعِفُوٓاْ أَنَحۡنُ صَدَدۡنَٰكُمۡ عَنِ ٱلۡهُدَىٰ بَعۡدَ إِذۡ جَآءَكُمۖ بَلۡ كُنتُم مُّجۡرِمِينَ
ayah_translit: qala alladhina is'takbaru lilladhina us'tud'ifu anahnu sadadnakum ani al-huda ba'da idh jaakum bal kuntum muj'rimina
ayah_english: Will say those who were arrogant to those who were oppressed Did we avert you from the guidance after when it had come to you Nay you were criminals

ayah: قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱسۡتَكۡبَرُواْ لِلَّذِينَ ٱسۡتُضۡعِفُوٓاْ أَنَحۡنُ صَدَدۡنَٰكُمۡ عَنِ ٱلۡهُدَىٰ بَعۡدَ إِذۡ جَآءَكُمۖ بَلۡ كُنتُم مُّجۡرِمِينَ

ayah: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱسۡتُضۡعِفُواْ لِلَّذِينَ ٱسۡتَكۡبَرُواْ بَلۡ مَكۡرُ ٱلَّيۡلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِ إِذۡ تَأۡمُرُونَنَآ أَن نَّكۡفُرَ بِٱللَّهِ وَنَجۡعَلَ لَهُۥٓ أَندَادٗاۚ وَأَسَرُّواْ ٱلنَّدَامَةَ لَمَّا رَأَوُاْ ٱلۡعَذَابَۚ وَجَعَلۡنَا ٱلۡأَغۡلَٰلَ فِيٓ أَعۡنَاقِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْۖ هَلۡ يُجۡزَوۡنَ إِلَّا مَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ
ayah_translit: waqala alladhina us'tud'ifu lilladhina is'takbaru bal makru al-layli wal-nahari idh tamurunana an nakfura bil-lahi wanaj'ala lahu andadan wa-asarru al-nadamata lamma ra-awu al-'adhaba waja'alna al-aghlala fi a'naqi alladhina kafaru hal yuj'zawna illa ma kanu ya'maluna
ayah_english: And will say those who were oppressed to those who were arrogant Nay (it was) a plot (by) night and (by) day when you were ordering us that we disbelieve in Allah and we set up for Him equals But they will conceal the regret when they see the punishment And We will put shackles on (the) necks (of) those who disbelieved Will they be recompensed except (for) what they used to do

ayah: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱسۡتُضۡعِفُواْ لِلَّذِينَ ٱسۡتَكۡبَرُواْ بَلۡ مَكۡرُ ٱلَّيۡلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِ إِذۡ تَأۡمُرُونَنَآ أَن نَّكۡفُرَ بِٱللَّهِ وَنَجۡعَلَ لَهُۥٓ أَندَادٗاۚ وَأَسَرُّواْ ٱلنَّدَامَةَ لَمَّا رَأَوُاْ ٱلۡعَذَابَۚ وَجَعَلۡنَا ٱلۡأَغۡلَٰلَ فِيٓ أَعۡنَاقِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْۖ هَلۡ يُجۡزَوۡنَ إِلَّا مَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ

ayah: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱسۡتُضۡعِفُواْ لِلَّذِينَ ٱسۡتَكۡبَرُواْ بَلۡ مَكۡرُ ٱلَّيۡلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِ إِذۡ تَأۡمُرُونَنَآ أَن نَّكۡفُرَ بِٱللَّهِ وَنَجۡعَلَ لَهُۥٓ أَندَادٗاۚ وَأَسَرُّواْ ٱلنَّدَامَةَ لَمَّا رَأَوُاْ ٱلۡعَذَابَۚ وَجَعَلۡنَا ٱلۡأَغۡلَٰلَ فِيٓ أَعۡنَاقِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْۖ هَلۡ يُجۡزَوۡنَ إِلَّا مَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ

ayah: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱسۡتُضۡعِفُواْ لِلَّذِينَ ٱسۡتَكۡبَرُواْ بَلۡ مَكۡرُ ٱلَّيۡلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِ إِذۡ تَأۡمُرُونَنَآ أَن نَّكۡفُرَ بِٱللَّهِ وَنَجۡعَلَ لَهُۥٓ أَندَادٗاۚ وَأَسَرُّواْ ٱلنَّدَامَةَ لَمَّا رَأَوُاْ ٱلۡعَذَابَۚ وَجَعَلۡنَا ٱلۡأَغۡلَٰلَ فِيٓ أَعۡنَاقِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْۖ هَلۡ يُجۡزَوۡنَ إِلَّا مَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ

ayah: وَمَآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا فِي قَرۡيَةٖ مِّن نَّذِيرٍ إِلَّا قَالَ مُتۡرَفُوهَآ إِنَّا بِمَآ أُرۡسِلۡتُم بِهِۦ كَٰفِرُونَ
ayah_translit: wama arsalna fi qaryatin min nadhirin illa qala mut'rafuha inna bima ur'sil'tum bihi kafiruna
ayah_english: And not We sent to a town any warner but said its wealthy ones Indeed we in what you have been sent with (are) disbelievers

ayah: وَمَآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا فِي قَرۡيَةٖ مِّن نَّذِيرٍ إِلَّا قَالَ مُتۡرَفُوهَآ إِنَّا بِمَآ أُرۡسِلۡتُم بِهِۦ كَٰفِرُونَ

ayah: وَقَالُواْ نَحۡنُ أَكۡثَرُ أَمۡوَٰلٗا وَأَوۡلَٰدٗا وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمُعَذَّبِينَ
ayah_translit: waqalu nahnu aktharu amwalan wa-awladan wama nahnu bimu'adhabina
ayah_english: And they say We (have) more wealth and children and not we will be punished

ayah: وَقَالُواْ نَحۡنُ أَكۡثَرُ أَمۡوَٰلٗا وَأَوۡلَٰدٗا وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمُعَذَّبِينَ

ayah_translit: waqalu nahnu aktharu amwalan wa-awladan wama nahnu bimu'adhabina

ayah: قُلۡ إِنَّ رَبِّي يَبۡسُطُ ٱلرِّزۡقَ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيَقۡدِرُ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: qul inna rabbi yabsutu al-riz'qa liman yashau wayaqdiru walakinna akthara al-nasi la ya'lamuna
ayah_english: Say Indeed my Lord extends the provision for whom He wills and restricts but most [the] people (do) not know

ayah: وَمَآ أَمۡوَٰلُكُمۡ وَلَآ أَوۡلَٰدُكُم بِٱلَّتِي تُقَرِّبُكُمۡ عِندَنَا زُلۡفَىٰٓ إِلَّا مَنۡ ءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا فَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ لَهُمۡ جَزَآءُ ٱلضِّعۡفِ بِمَا عَمِلُواْ وَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡغُرُفَٰتِ ءَامِنُونَ
ayah_translit: wama amwalukum wala awladukum bi-allati tuqarribukum indana zul'fa illa man amana wa'amila salihan fa-ulaika lahum jazau al-di'fi bima amilu wahum fi al-ghurufati aminuna
ayah_english: And not your wealth and not your children [that] will bring you close to Us (in) position but whoever believes and does righteousness then those for them (will be) reward two-fold for what they did and they (will be) in the high dwellings secure

ayah: وَمَآ أَمۡوَٰلُكُمۡ وَلَآ أَوۡلَٰدُكُم بِٱلَّتِي تُقَرِّبُكُمۡ عِندَنَا زُلۡفَىٰٓ إِلَّا مَنۡ ءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا فَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ لَهُمۡ جَزَآءُ ٱلضِّعۡفِ بِمَا عَمِلُواْ وَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡغُرُفَٰتِ ءَامِنُونَ

ayah: وَمَآ أَمۡوَٰلُكُمۡ وَلَآ أَوۡلَٰدُكُم بِٱلَّتِي تُقَرِّبُكُمۡ عِندَنَا زُلۡفَىٰٓ إِلَّا مَنۡ ءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا فَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ لَهُمۡ جَزَآءُ ٱلضِّعۡفِ بِمَا عَمِلُواْ وَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡغُرُفَٰتِ ءَامِنُونَ

ayah: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَسۡعَوۡنَ فِيٓ ءَايَٰتِنَا مُعَٰجِزِينَ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ فِي ٱلۡعَذَابِ مُحۡضَرُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-alladhina yas'awna fi ayatina mu'ajizina ulaika fi al-'adhabi muh'daruna
ayah_english: And those who strive against Our Verses (to) cause failure those into the punishment (will be) brought

ayah: قُلۡ إِنَّ رَبِّي يَبۡسُطُ ٱلرِّزۡقَ لِمَن يَشَآءُ مِنۡ عِبَادِهِۦ وَيَقۡدِرُ لَهُۥۚ وَمَآ أَنفَقۡتُم مِّن شَيۡءٖ فَهُوَ يُخۡلِفُهُۥۖ وَهُوَ خَيۡرُ ٱلرَّـٰزِقِينَ
ayah_translit: qul inna rabbi yabsutu al-riz'qa liman yashau min ibadihi wayaqdiru lahu wama anfaqtum min shayin fahuwa yukh'lifuhu wahuwa khayru al-raziqina
ayah_english: Say Indeed my Lord extends the provision for whom He wills of His slaves and restricts for him But what you spend of anything then He will compensate it and He (is the) Best (of) the Providers

ayah: قُلۡ إِنَّ رَبِّي يَبۡسُطُ ٱلرِّزۡقَ لِمَن يَشَآءُ مِنۡ عِبَادِهِۦ وَيَقۡدِرُ لَهُۥۚ وَمَآ أَنفَقۡتُم مِّن شَيۡءٖ فَهُوَ يُخۡلِفُهُۥۖ وَهُوَ خَيۡرُ ٱلرَّـٰزِقِينَ

ayah: قُلۡ إِنَّ رَبِّي يَبۡسُطُ ٱلرِّزۡقَ لِمَن يَشَآءُ مِنۡ عِبَادِهِۦ وَيَقۡدِرُ لَهُۥۚ وَمَآ أَنفَقۡتُم مِّن شَيۡءٖ فَهُوَ يُخۡلِفُهُۥۖ وَهُوَ خَيۡرُ ٱلرَّـٰزِقِينَ

ayah: وَيَوۡمَ يَحۡشُرُهُمۡ جَمِيعٗا ثُمَّ يَقُولُ لِلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ أَهَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ إِيَّاكُمۡ كَانُواْ يَعۡبُدُونَ
ayah_translit: wayawma yahshuruhum jami'an thumma yaqulu lil'malaikati ahaulai iyyakum kanu ya'buduna
ayah_english: And (the) Day He will gather them all then He will say to the Angels Were these you Were these you they were worshipping

ayah_english: And (the) Day He will gather them all then He will say to the Angels Were these you Were these you they were worshipping

ayah: قَالُواْ سُبۡحَٰنَكَ أَنتَ وَلِيُّنَا مِن دُونِهِمۖ بَلۡ كَانُواْ يَعۡبُدُونَ ٱلۡجِنَّۖ أَكۡثَرُهُم بِهِم مُّؤۡمِنُونَ
ayah_translit: qalu sub'hanaka anta waliyyuna min dunihim bal kanu ya'buduna al-jina aktharuhum bihim mu'minuna
ayah_english: They will say Glory be to You You (are) our Protector not them not them Nay they used (to) worship the jinn most of them in them (were) believers

ayah_translit: qalu sub'hanaka anta waliyyuna min dunihim bal kanu ya'buduna al-jina aktharuhum bihim mu'minuna

ayah: فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ لَا يَمۡلِكُ بَعۡضُكُمۡ لِبَعۡضٖ نَّفۡعٗا وَلَا ضَرّٗا وَنَقُولُ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ ذُوقُواْ عَذَابَ ٱلنَّارِ ٱلَّتِي كُنتُم بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ
ayah_translit: fal-yawma la yamliku ba'dukum liba'din naf 'an wala darran wanaqulu lilladhina zalamu dhuqu adhaba al-nari allati kuntum biha tukadhibuna
ayah_english: But today not possess power some of you on others to benefit and not to harm and We will say to those who wronged Taste (the) punishment (of) the Fire which you used to [it] deny

ayah: وَإِذَا تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ءَايَٰتُنَا بَيِّنَٰتٖ قَالُواْ مَا هَٰذَآ إِلَّا رَجُلٞ يُرِيدُ أَن يَصُدَّكُمۡ عَمَّا كَانَ يَعۡبُدُ ءَابَآؤُكُمۡ وَقَالُواْ مَا هَٰذَآ إِلَّآ إِفۡكٞ مُّفۡتَرٗىۚ وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لِلۡحَقِّ لَمَّا جَآءَهُمۡ إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحۡرٞ مُّبِينٞ
ayah_translit: wa-idha tut'la alayhim ayatuna bayyinatin qalu ma hadha illa rajulun yuridu an yasuddakum amma kana ya'budu abaukum waqalu ma hadha illa if'kun muf'taran waqala alladhina kafaru lil'haqqi lamma jaahum in hadha illa sih'run mubinun
ayah_english: And when are recited to them Our Verses clear they say Not (is) this but a man who wishes to hinder you from what used (to) worship your forefathers And they say Not (is) this except a lie invented And said those who disbelieved about the truth when it came to them Not (is) this except a magic obvious

ayah: وَإِذَا تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ءَايَٰتُنَا بَيِّنَٰتٖ قَالُواْ مَا هَٰذَآ إِلَّا رَجُلٞ يُرِيدُ أَن يَصُدَّكُمۡ عَمَّا كَانَ يَعۡبُدُ ءَابَآؤُكُمۡ وَقَالُواْ مَا هَٰذَآ إِلَّآ إِفۡكٞ مُّفۡتَرٗىۚ وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لِلۡحَقِّ لَمَّا جَآءَهُمۡ إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحۡرٞ مُّبِينٞ
ayah_translit: wa-idha tut'la alayhim ayatuna bayyinatin qalu ma hadha illa rajulun yuridu an yasuddakum amma kana ya'budu abaukum waqalu ma hadha illa if'kun muf'taran waqala alladhina kafaru lil'haqqi lamma jaahum in hadha illa sih'run mubinun

ayah: وَمَآ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُم مِّن كُتُبٖ يَدۡرُسُونَهَاۖ وَمَآ أَرۡسَلۡنَآ إِلَيۡهِمۡ قَبۡلَكَ مِن نَّذِيرٖ
ayah_translit: wama ataynahum min kutubin yadrusunaha wama arsalna ilayhim qablaka min nadhirin
ayah_english: And not We (had) given them any Scriptures which they could study and not We sent to them before you any warner

ayah: وَكَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ وَمَا بَلَغُواْ مِعۡشَارَ مَآ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُمۡ فَكَذَّبُواْ رُسُلِيۖ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ
ayah_translit: wakadhaba alladhina min qablihim wama balaghu mi'shara ma ataynahum fakadhabu rusuli fakayfa kana nakiri
ayah_english: And denied those who (were) before them (were) before them and not they have attained a tenth (of) what We (had) given them But they denied My Messengers so how was My rejection

ayah: ۞قُلۡ إِنَّمَآ أَعِظُكُم بِوَٰحِدَةٍۖ أَن تَقُومُواْ لِلَّهِ مَثۡنَىٰ وَفُرَٰدَىٰ ثُمَّ تَتَفَكَّرُواْۚ مَا بِصَاحِبِكُم مِّن جِنَّةٍۚ إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا نَذِيرٞ لَّكُم بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡ عَذَابٖ شَدِيدٖ
ayah_translit: qul innama a'izukum biwahidatin an taqumu lillahi mathna wafurada thumma tatafakkaru ma bisahibikum min jinnatin in huwa illa nadhirun lakum bayna yaday adhabin shadidin
ayah_english: Say Only I advise you for one (thing) that you stand for Allah (in) pairs and (as) individuals then reflect Not (is in) your companion any madness Not he (is) except a warner for you before before a punishment severe

ayah: ۞قُلۡ إِنَّمَآ أَعِظُكُم بِوَٰحِدَةٍۖ أَن تَقُومُواْ لِلَّهِ مَثۡنَىٰ وَفُرَٰدَىٰ ثُمَّ تَتَفَكَّرُواْۚ مَا بِصَاحِبِكُم مِّن جِنَّةٍۚ إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا نَذِيرٞ لَّكُم بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡ عَذَابٖ شَدِيدٖ

ayah: قُلۡ مَا سَأَلۡتُكُم مِّنۡ أَجۡرٖ فَهُوَ لَكُمۡۖ إِنۡ أَجۡرِيَ إِلَّا عَلَى ٱللَّهِۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ شَهِيدٞ
ayah_translit: qul ma sa-altukum min ajrin fahuwa lakum in ajriya illa ala al-lahi wahuwa ala kulli shayin shahidun
ayah_english: Say Not I ask you for any payment but it (is) for you Not (is) my payment but from Allah And He (is) over all things a Witness

ayah: قُلۡ إِنَّ رَبِّي يَقۡذِفُ بِٱلۡحَقِّ عَلَّـٰمُ ٱلۡغُيُوبِ
ayah_translit: qul inna rabbi yaqdhifu bil-haqi allamu al-ghuyubi
ayah_english: Say Indeed my Lord projects the truth (the) All-Knower (of) the unseen

ayah: قُلۡ جَآءَ ٱلۡحَقُّ وَمَا يُبۡدِئُ ٱلۡبَٰطِلُ وَمَا يُعِيدُ
ayah_translit: qul jaa al-haqu wama yub'di-u al-batilu wama yu'idu
ayah_english: Say Has come the truth and not (can) originate the falsehood and not repeat

ayah: قُلۡ إِن ضَلَلۡتُ فَإِنَّمَآ أَضِلُّ عَلَىٰ نَفۡسِيۖ وَإِنِ ٱهۡتَدَيۡتُ فَبِمَا يُوحِيٓ إِلَيَّ رَبِّيٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ سَمِيعٞ قَرِيبٞ
ayah_translit: qul in dalaltu fa-innama adillu ala nafsi wa-ini ih'tadaytu fabima yuhi ilayya rabbi innahu sami'un qaribun
ayah_english: Say If I err then only I will err against myself But if I am guided then it is by what reveals to me my Lord Indeed He (is) All-Hearer Ever-Near

ayah: قُلۡ إِن ضَلَلۡتُ فَإِنَّمَآ أَضِلُّ عَلَىٰ نَفۡسِيۖ وَإِنِ ٱهۡتَدَيۡتُ فَبِمَا يُوحِيٓ إِلَيَّ رَبِّيٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ سَمِيعٞ قَرِيبٞ

ayah: وَلَوۡ تَرَىٰٓ إِذۡ فَزِعُواْ فَلَا فَوۡتَ وَأُخِذُواْ مِن مَّكَانٖ قَرِيبٖ
ayah_translit: walaw tara idh fazi'u fala fawta wa-ukhidhu min makanin qaribin
ayah_english: And if you (could) see when they will be terrified but (there will be) no escape and they will be seized from a place near

ayah: وَقَالُوٓاْ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُمُ ٱلتَّنَاوُشُ مِن مَّكَانِۭ بَعِيدٖ
ayah_translit: waqalu amanna bihi wa-anna lahumu al-tanawushu min makanin ba'idin
ayah_english: And they will say We believe in it But how for them (will be) the receiving from a place far off

ayah: وَقَدۡ كَفَرُواْ بِهِۦ مِن قَبۡلُۖ وَيَقۡذِفُونَ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ مِن مَّكَانِۭ بَعِيدٖ
ayah_translit: waqad kafaru bihi min qablu wayaqdhifuna bil-ghaybi min makanin ba'idin
ayah_english: And certainly they disbelieved in it before before And they utter conjectures about the unseen from a place far off

ayah: وَحِيلَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ وَبَيۡنَ مَا يَشۡتَهُونَ كَمَا فُعِلَ بِأَشۡيَاعِهِم مِّن قَبۡلُۚ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ فِي شَكّٖ مُّرِيبِۭ
ayah_translit: wahila baynahum wabayna ma yashtahuna kama fu'ila bi-ashya'ihim min qablu innahum kanu fi shakkin muribin
ayah_english: And a barrier will be placed between them and between what they desire as was done with their kind before before Indeed, they were in doubt disquieting
word_tranlation: And a barrier will be placed

ayah: وَحِيلَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ وَبَيۡنَ مَا يَشۡتَهُونَ كَمَا فُعِلَ بِأَشۡيَاعِهِم مِّن قَبۡلُۚ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ فِي شَكّٖ مُّرِيبِۭ
